direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods add content to the element but at different positions (start vs. end).
Both methods insert nodes at the beginning of the element's children.
Both methods create and add new elements to the element's children but at different positions.
Both methods involve inserting children at specific positions, though 'prepend' is more specific to the start.
Both methods handle text insertion but at different positions within the element.

enhanced_by.reason: Ensures the child nodes list is initialized before prepending.
